intro: Explore scenic landscapes and rich history of this iconic region.
description:
Unearth the wonders of New England in a game that combines history, adventure, and hidden object challenges. 
'Finding America: New England' takes you on an unforgettable journey. 
Seek out hidden objects amidst stunning scenery and unlock the stories of America's colonial past.

Along your journey, you'll encounter fascinating trivia about the iconic locations, play fun mini-games, and see the beauty of the New England.

- Behold the sights of New England, all done in a Hidden Object style.
- Play over 30 fun minigames, all connected to the Great Lakes area!
- Pick up fun facts about the region!
- Collector's Edition contains 12 more chapters and 6 exclusive Hidden Object scenes!
